document.title: Sexual orientation: A cultural diversity issue for nursing
document.abstract: Traditional approaches to cultural diversity and the development of a culturally aware workforce have consistently ignored the importance of gender role orientation and sexual orientation as sources of potential conflict in the work environment. To maintain its integrity as a caring profession, nursing must take steps to end personal and professional discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation.
document.publication-title: Faculty Publications and Other Works -- Nursing

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Misener, T. R., Sowell, R. L., Phillips, K. D., & *Harris, C. M. (1997). Sexual orientation: A cultural diversity issue for nursing. Nursing Outlook, 45(4), 178-181.
